meaningMnemonic: If a <radical>turkey</radical> is pointing its <radical>fingers</radical> at you, you can <kanji>infer</kanji> that it wants revenge. This turkey knows you killed his brother for dinner last night, and now he’s going to make you pay. You infer that this turkey is going to take their fingers and wrap them around your neck.
readingMnemonic: You were able to <kanji>infer</kanji> the turkey's plan, so now it's your turn. You look around and see the only way out... is to <reading>swi</reading>ng (すい) to safety! How did I infer that, dear Watson? Why, isn't it obvious! There are vines here. Turkeys can't fly. So I shall swing my way to freedom!
